algorithm_technique: Prefix sums to efficiently calculate path distances in a circular array.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the minimum time to visit houses in a circular arrangement based on given queries.
problem_summary_technical: Uses prefix sums on forward and backward paths to calculate minimum travel time between houses in a circular arrangement.
key_insights: The circular nature of the houses requires careful handling of indices when calculating distances.
Prefix sums are crucial for optimizing the calculation of distances between any two points on the circle.
The problem can be viewed as finding the shortest path on an unrolled circle, considering both directions.
